skills.name: Rock Surfing
skills.blurb: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Taliyah''' gains up to {{pp|key=%|20 to 45|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, which builds up over 1 second if she had been near terrain or [[structures]] for at least {{fd|0.4}} seconds and decays by the {{tt|same amount|more in details}} if out of [[range]] for at least {{fd|0.8}} seconds.

Entering [[combat status|combat]] or casting an [[champion ability|ability]] puts ''Rock Surfing'' on a 2 second {{sti|cooldown}}, which refreshes continuously while remaining in combat or casting abilities.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Taliyah gains up to 20% − 45% (based on level) bonus movement speed, which builds up over 1 second if she had been near terrain or structures for at least 0.4 seconds and decays by the same amount if out of range for at least 0.8 seconds.
Entering combat status or casting an champion ability puts Rock Surfing on a 2 second cooldown, which refreshes continuously while remaining in combat or casting abilities.
skills.notes:
* The build up and decay changes by the same amount in the same interval, which is 25% of the maximum value every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
* ''Rock Surfing'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].

skills.name: Threaded Volley
skills.blurb: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' unleashes 5 ''Stone Shards'' in quick succession in the target direction over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first target hit. Enemies hit by multiple ''Stone Shards'' take 50% damage beyond the first. {{tip|monster|Monsters}} take 80% damage from subsequent stones.
'''Taliyah''' can move and cast other abilities while launching ''Stone Shards'', and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third ''Stone Shard''.

Casting ''Threaded Volley'' creates an area of ''Worked Ground'' 450 units around '''Taliyah''' that lasts {{tt|45|Unaffected by ability haste}} seconds. While on ''Worked Ground'', ''Threaded Volley's'' {{sti|{{as|mana cost}}}} is reduced to {{as|1|mana}} and '''Taliyah''' only hurls one ''Stone Shard'' when casting.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taliyah unleashes 5 Stone Shards in quick succession in the target direction over 1.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to the first target hit. Enemies hit by multiple Stone Shards take 50% damage beyond the first. Monsters take 80% damage from subsequent stones.
Taliyah can move and cast other abilities while launching Stone Shards, and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third Stone Shard.
Casting Threaded Volley creates an area of Worked Ground 450 units around Taliyah that lasts 45 seconds. While on Worked Ground, Threaded Volley's mana cost is reduced to 1 and Taliyah only hurls one Stone Shard when casting.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 170}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Target Damage|{{ap|70*3 to 170*3}} {{as|(+ 135% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|70*5 to 170*5}} {{as|(+ 225% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* The first ''Stone Shard'' hit on each target is considered {{tip|spell damage}}, while additional ones of the same cast are considered {{tip|persistent damage}}.
* The first ''Stone Shard'' is launched instantly after the cast time ends, then the second and third ''Stone Shards'' are both launched over 1 second, and finally the fourth and fifth ''Stone Shards'' are both launched over {{fd|0.5}} seconds. 
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only prevents one instance of damage.
* Entering {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} will end ''Threaded Volley'' prematurely.

effects.str:
• Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)
  • Maximum Single-Target Damage: (+ 135% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 225% AP)

skills.name: Seismic Shove
skills.blurb: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' marks the target location and selects a direction. After 1 second, a boulder erupts from beneath the area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within and {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them in the target direction for 1 second.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Taliyah marks the target location and selects a direction. After 1 second, a boulder erupts from beneath the area, dealing magic damage to all enemies within and knocking them in the target direction for 1 second.
skills.notes: * ''Seismic Shove'' can knock targets over walls.

skills.name: Unraveled Earth
skills.blurb: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' scatters 18 boulders over the ground in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area.

The boulders then remain for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within the area by 20% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}}. At the end of their duration, all remaining boulders explode, dealing the same damage to enemies within.

Enemies that {{tip|dash}} or are {{tip|airborne|knocked}} through the boulders will detonate them instantly, each dealing them {{as|magic damage}}. Enemies can detonate multiple boulders, up to 4, but the damage is reduced by {{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|type=boulders detonated|0 to 45 for 4}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taliyah scatters 18 boulders over the ground in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area.
The boulders then remain for 4 seconds, slowing all enemies within the area by 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP). At the end of their duration, all remaining boulders explode, dealing the same damage to enemies within.
Enemies that dash or are knocked through the boulders will detonate them instantly, each dealing them magic damage. Enemies can detonate multiple boulders, up to 4, but the damage is reduced by 0% − 45 for 4% (based on level).
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 150}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|50*2 to 150*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Trigger Damage|{{ap|50 to 90}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Trigger Damage|{{ap|50*(1+0.85+0.7+0.55) to 90*(1+0.85+0.7+0.55)}} {{as|(+ 93% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Unraveled Earth'' will only deal damage to the enemy that detonated it.
* ''Unraveled Earth'' will fire from wherever '''Taliyah''' was at the start of the cast time.

skills.name: Weaver's Wall
skills.blurb: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' summons a massive wall of spiraling rocks that tear through the battlefield in the target direction, creating impassable terrain for 5 seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} allied and enemy {{tip|champions}} it passes through as it emerges. '''Taliyah''' also {{tip|channel|channels}} and {{tip|sight|reveals}} herself for 1 second, during which ''Weaver's Wall'' can be recast. ''Weaver's Wall'' can also be recast while the wall has yet to expire after it has reached its {{tt|maximum range|after 1.75 seconds}}.

{{sbc|Recast:}} Upon completing the {{tip|channel}}, '''Taliyah''' {{tip|dash|surfs}} the wall as it emerges, during which she {{tip|sight|reveals}} herself to the enemies. Taking [[damage]] from enemy champions or {{tip|turret|turrets}} during the channel or while riding the wall will prevent her from surfing for the former and force her off the wall for the latter. After {{fd|0.75}} seconds, she can input a movement command to manually jump off the wall. If recast after the wall has reached its {{tt|maximum range|after 1.75 seconds}}, '''Taliyah''' manually destroys it. '''Taliyah''' can {{tip|dash|surf}} the wall without having to destroy it early, and vice versa.
'''''Taliyah''' will be forced off the wall by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during the surf.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taliyah summons a massive wall of spiraling rocks that tear through the battlefield in the target direction, creating impassable terrain for 5 seconds and knocking aside allied and enemy champions it passes through as it emerges. Taliyah also channels and reveals herself for 1 second, during which Weaver's Wall can be recast. Weaver's Wall can also be recast while the wall has yet to expire after it has reached its maximum range.
Recast: Upon completing the channel, Taliyah surfs the wall as it emerges, during which she reveals herself to the enemies. Taking damage from enemy champions or turrets during the channel or while riding the wall will prevent her from surfing for the former and force her off the wall for the latter. After 0.75 seconds, she can input a movement command to manually jump off the wall. If recast after the wall has reached its maximum range, Taliyah manually destroys it. Taliyah can surf the wall without having to destroy it early, and vice versa.
Taliyah will be forced off the wall by any immobilizing crowd control during the surf.
skills.notes:
*The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**However neither recasts do.
* ''Weaver's Wall'', while {{tip|channel|channeling}}, can be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} but not while {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} will prevent ''Weaver's Wall'' from summoning any further but does not destroy any initial terrain it spawned. If '''Taliyah''' is surfing during the collision, she immediately becomes {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, interrupting the surf.
* If '''Taliyah''' would enter terrain and the wall reaches maximum range inside, she is preemptively forced off the wall before entering.
** The wall can surpass the edges of the map, but '''Taliyah''' cannot.
* If ''Weaver's Wall'' is allowed to expire normally, the wall collapses with the same progression as it was formed.
* She's more likely to jump off to the left side of ''Weaver's Wall''.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Taliyah''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
** The channel is not {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|ground}} and {{tip|root}} despite being a [[Channel#Movement Channels|movement channel]].
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=Disabled, but can activate trinkets|items=false|spells=false,false,false,interrupts,false|interrupts=death, silence}}
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Taliyah''' is {{tip|dash|surfing}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=Disabled, but can activate trinkets|items=false|spells=false,false,false,interrupts,false|interrupts=death, root|damage=true}}
